chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (n0 : nat) (b : mon (S n0)) (x : nat) (m : mon n0), b = c_n n0 x m -> {a : nat * mon n0 | b = monLift n0 a}

Premises:
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
monLift : forall n : nat, nat * mon n -> mon (S n)
c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
proj_ok : forall (d : nat) (m : mon (S d)), c_n d (pmon1 (S d) m) (pmon2 (S d) m) = m
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : Fin.t m) {struct n} : {i : nat | i < m} := match n in (Fin.t n0) return {i : nat | i < n0} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => i < S j) 0 (PeanoNat.Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < S n0) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, Fin.t m -> {i : nat | i < m} Arguments Fin.to_nat {m}%nat_scope
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
mon_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> Prop, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m
mon_sind : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> SProp, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m
mon_rect : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> Type, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m
mon_rec : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> Set, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m
jjProp1 : forall (d : nat) (m : mon d), d = 0 -> m = jj d
ppcm_com : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), ppcm_mon d a b = ppcm_mon d b a
mult_mon_com : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), mult_mon d a b = mult_mon d b a
mdiv_div : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), mdiv d b a -> mult_mon d (div_mon d a b) b = a
mult_div_com : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), div_mon d (mult_mon d a b) b = a
recomp_ok : forall (d : nat) (h : d <> 0) (m : mon d), recomp d h m = m
ppcm_prop_r : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), ppcm_mon d a b = mult_mon d (div_mon d (ppcm_mon d a b) b) b
ppcm_prop_l : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), ppcm_mon d a b = mult_mon d (div_mon d (ppcm_mon d a b) a) a
BinIntDef.Z.of_nat = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => BinNums.Z0 | S n0 => BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.of_succ_nat n0) end : nat -> BinNums.Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.of_nat _%nat_scope
div_clean_dec2 : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), (let (_, b0) := div_mon_clean d a b in b0) = false -> mult_mon d (div_mon d a b) b <> a
mult_mon_assoc : forall (d : nat) (a b c : mon d), mult_mon d a (mult_mon d b c) = mult_mon d (mult_mon d a b) c
mdiv_proj : forall (d : nat) (m m' : mon (S d)), pmon1 (S d) m <= pmon1 (S d) m' -> mdiv d (pmon2 (S d) m) (pmon2 (S d) m') -> mdiv (S d) m m'
mdiv_sind : forall P : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> SProp, P 0 n_0 n_0 -> (forall (d : nat) (v v' : mon d) (n n' : nat), n <= n' -> mdiv d v v' -> P d v v' -> P (S d) (c_n d n v) (c_n d n' v')) -> forall (d : nat) (m m0 : mon d), mdiv d m m0 -> P d m m0
mdiv_ind : forall P : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> Prop, P 0 n_0 n_0 -> (forall (d : nat) (v v' : mon d) (n n' : nat), n <= n' -> mdiv d v v' -> P d v v' -> P (S d) (c_n d n v) (c_n d n' v')) -> forall (d : nat) (m m0 : mon d), mdiv d m m0 -> P d m m0
eqmon_dec : forall (d : nat) (x y : mon d), {x = y} + {x <> y}
div_clean_dec1 : forall (d : nat) (a b : mon d), (let (_, b0) := div_mon_clean d a b in b0) = true -> (let (m, _) := div_mon_clean d a b in m) = div_mon d a b /\ mult_mon d (div_mon d a b) b = a
is_nil_id : forall (d : nat) (a : mon d), a = is_nil d a
ppcm_mom_is_ppcm : forall (d : nat) (a b c : mon d), c = mult_mon d (div_mon d c a) a -> c = mult_mon d (div_mon d c b) b -> c = mult_mon d (div_mon d c (ppcm_mon d a b)) (ppcm_mon d a b)
div_mon_clean : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d * bool
mult_div_id : forall (d : nat) (a : mon d), div_mon d a a = zero_mon d
mult_mon_zero_l : forall (d : nat) (a : mon d), mult_mon d (zero_mon d) a = a
mult_mon_zero_r : forall (d : nat) (a : mon d), mult_mon d a (zero_mon d) = a
Peano_dec.le_unique : forall (m n : nat) (le_mn1 le_mn2 : m <= n), le_mn1 = le_mn2
